name: Aave Folding
description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} repeatedly on [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Aave Folding
en.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} repeatedly on [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Aave Folding
fr.description: Fournit et emprunte {{token}} à plusieurs reprises sur [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) pour générer des intérêts et gagner des jetons AAVE jalonnés. Une fois déverrouillés, les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui est déposé dans la stratégie.

es.name: Aave Folding
es.description: Suministra y pide prestado {{token}} repetidamente en [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) para generar intereses y ganar tokens AAVE en staking. Una vez desbloqueados, los tokens ganados se cosechan y se venden por más {{token}} que se depositan nuevamente en la estrategia.

de.name: Aave Folding
de.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} repeatedly on [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

pt.name: Aave Folding
pt.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} repeatedly on [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

el.name: Aave Folding
el.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} repeatedly on [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

tr.name: Aave Folding
tr.description: Faiz oluşturmak ve stake edilen AAVE jetonlarını kazanmak için [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) üzerinde art arda hem {{token}} sağlar hem ödünç alır. Kilidi açıldıktan sonra, kazanılan jetonlar hasat edilir, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.

vi.name: Aave Folding
vi.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} repeatedly on [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Aave Folding
zh.description: 在 [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) 循环存入和借出 {{token}} 以赚取更多的利息和 stAAVE 奖励。赚到的 stkAAVE 解锁后，收获并卖掉以换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。

hi.name: Aave Folding
hi.description: ब्याज उत्पन्न करने और दांव पर लगे AAVE टोकन अर्जित करने के लिए [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) पर {{token}} बार-बार आपूर्ति और उधार लेता है। एक बार अनलॉक होने के बाद, अर्जित टोकन काटा जाता है, और अधिक {{token}} में बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
